body.raw:
{
	"id": null,
	"partyRoleType": "Customer",
	"party": [{
		"id": null,
		"partyType": "Individual",
        "salutation": "{{$randomNamePrefix}}",
		"firstName": "{{$randomFirstName}}",
        "birthDate":"1984-03-17",
		"lastName": "{{$randomLastName}}",
        "contactPoints":[
    {
        "contactPointType": [
            "ContactPointPhone"
        ],
        "id": null,
        "activeFromDate": "2015-03-15",
        "telephoneNumber": "{{$randomPhoneNumber}}",
        "extensionNumber": "22444",
        "formattedE164PhoneNumber": "+1 {{$randomPhoneNumber}}",
        "formattedInternationalPhoneNumber": "001 {{$randomPhoneNumber}}"
    },
    {
        "contactPointType": [
            "ContactPointEmail"
        ],
        "id": null,
        "activeFromDate": "2015-03-15",
        "profileLastUpdatedDate": "00:01:01",
        "emailAddress": "testuser{{$timestamp}}@gmail.com",
        "emailBouncedReason": "test bounce",
        "emailDomain": "{{$randomDomainName}}",
        "emailMailBox": "spam"
    },
    {
        "contactPointType": [
            "ContactPointAddress"
        ],
        "id": null,
        "activeFromDate": "2020-03-05",
        "geoLongitude": {{$randomLongitude}},
        "geoLatitude": {{$randomLatitude}},
        "cityName": "{{$randomCity}}",
        "addressLine1": "{{$randomStreetName}}",
        "stateProvinceName": "TX",
        "addressLine4": "{{$randomCity}}",
        "countryName": "USA"
    }
]
	}],
	"externalIds": [{
		"id": null,
		"externalId": "{{$randomUUID}}",
		"externalIdType": ["MDM"]
	}],
	"customerStatus": "ACTIVE",
    "customerNumber":"{{$randomBankAccountBic}}"
}

{
    "id": null,
    "partyType": "Individual",
    "salutation": "{{$randomNamePrefix}}",
    "firstName": "{{$randomFirstName}}",
    "personName": "{{$randomFirstName}}",
    "birthDate": "1988-01-12",
    "lastName": "{{$randomLastName}}",
    "contactPoints": [
        {
            "contactPointType": [
                "ContactPointPhone"
            ],
            "id": null,
            "activeFromDate": "2015-03-15",
            "telephoneNumber": "{{$randomPhoneNumber}}",
            "extensionNumber": "22444",
            "formattedE164PhoneNumber": "+1 {{$randomPhoneNumber}}",
            "formattedInternationalPhoneNumber": "001 {{$randomPhoneNumber}}"
        },
        {
            "contactPointType": [
                "ContactPointEmail"
            ],
            "id": null,
            "activeFromDate": "2015-03-15",
            "profileLastUpdatedDate": "00:01:01",
            "emailAddress": "testuser{{$timestamp}}@gmail.com",
            "emailBouncedReason": "test bounce",
            "emailDomain": "{{$randomDomainName}}",
            "emailMailBox": "spam"
        },
        {
            "contactPointType": [
                "ContactPointAddress"
            ],
            "id": null,
            "activeFromDate": "2020-03-05",
            "geoLongitude": {{$randomLongitude}},
            "geoLatitude": {{$randomLatitude}},
            "cityName": "{{$randomCity}}",
            "addressLine1": "{{$randomStreetName}}",

    ],
    "externalIds": [
        {
            "id": null,
            "externalId": "{{$randomUUID}}",
            "externalIdType": [
                "MDM"
            ]
        }
    ]
}
